agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Natural Resources TIME & DATE: 10:30 AM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Tuesday, April 23, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Lyle Larson The committee will meet to consider the following bills: HB 4458 Rodriguez Relating to the sources of supply of water for certain municipally owned water utilities. HB 4477 Springer Relating to Public Utility Commission to ensure compliance and rate regulation. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
